content.query:
--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_loans_test
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO ML.loans_test
(LoanID 1, CustomerID 2, CurrentLoanAmount 3, Term 4, CreditScore 5, AnnualIncome 6, Yearsincurrentjob 7, HomeOwnership 8, Purpose 9, MonthlyDebt 10, YearsofCreditHistory 11, Monthssincelastdelinquent 12, NumberofOpenAccounts 13, NumberofCreditProblems 14, CurrentCreditBalance 15, MaximumOpenCredit 16, Bankruptcies 17, TaxLiens 18)
FROM 'https://adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/raw/MLExample/credit_test.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://adldemost.dfs.core.windows.net/synapse/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM ML.loans_test
GO
